Jacob Bautista, M.D. 589 Eldorado Circle Coeburn, WA 42646
Re: Kenneth Umstead MR# 401-10-87-8
Dear Jac:
I saw your patient Kenneth Umstead in the Cardiology Office today and he feels he has actually improved. His primary limitation had been his claudication, but he feels that he can walk better now than in the past. We had a repeat evaluation of his segmental leg pressure and volumes, and these actually were unchanged from a prior study two years ago. The post volume recordings were normal in each leg. Systolic pressure gradients were present in the right leg consistent with mild anterior tibial/dorsalis pedis disease. No systolic pressure gradients were found in the left leg. These were unchanged from January, 2072. Mr. Umstead feels that he can be more physically active and is less limited.
His current medical regimen includes Metoprolol 50 mg b.i.d., Nifedipine XL 60 mg q.d., and Lasix 20 mg q.d.
Of note, in October, 2073, he was found by colonoscopy to have four polyps which were removed. Apparently, no malignant cells were seen in the pathologic specimens.
On exam, he is comfortable with a blood pressure of 122/68, heart rate 63 and regular, weight 205 lbs. HEENT unremarkable. Chest was clear. Cardiac exam showed no jugular venous distention at 30 degrees, PMI is normal. S1 and S2 normal but physiologically split. There was an S4 and a I/VI systolic ejection murmur at the lower left sternal border. Abdominal exam was unremarkable. Extremities show no edema or cyanosis.
His resting 12 lead EKG demonstrates normal sinus rhythm, left axis deviation, and persisting X waves across the precordium consistent with his left anterior hemiblock.
I think Mr. Umstead is doing quite well. He asked that I see him again in six months for routine re-evaluation, and I would be happy to do so. If any problems develop in the interim please don't hesitate to contact me. Thank you for allowing me to participate in his care.
Kenneth Umstead MR# 401-10-87-8 -2- Jun 04, 2074
With best regards.
Sincerely,
Marshall O. Lehman, M.D. Wilson Medical Center 30 Whipple St Tonkawa, WA 67495
